title: Translator
description: A simple translator cog that translates every messages you send to your desired language by editing the message you sent. Easy toggle translation mode on/off. Note: tc_translator requires googletrans module to translate your messages. If you're using your selfbot locally, then you can install googletrans using following command in your console: 'pip install googletrans'. If you've deployed your selbot on heroku then you've to add 'googletrans==2.2.0' from new line in requirements.txt which you can find in root folder of your self bot and then you may commit and push it to heroku. For more help, join our discord server: https://discord.gg/pBKUrv4
